title: Add Sublicensing Rights
instruction: Modify the license grant section to allow the licensee to sublicense the licensed technology to its affiliates and subsidiaries, subject to written notice to the licensor and compliance with all agreement terms.

party1.name: DataFlow Systems LLC
party1.address: 1455 Market Street, Suite 1600, San Francisco, CA 94103

party2.name: Quantum Insights Corp.
party2.address: 500 Howard Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, CA 94105
